definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: I'm not a mama's boy, I can do it by myself.
sentences.chinese: 我并不娇生惯养，我可以自己做好这个。

sentences.english: Being the youngest and spoilt, my with was granted.
sentences.chinese: 作为家中的老小被娇生惯养，我的愿望被满足了。

sentences.english: So top billing should go to deregulating cosseted industries and reforming the labour market.
sentences.chinese: 因此，应该开放那些娇生惯养产业和改革劳动力市场。

sentences.english: Snuggle down in cosseted support on our Mattress Topper.
sentences.chinese: 依偎在了我们的床垫礼帽娇生惯养的支持。

sentences.english: I am afraid that you find a husband who is mama's boy .
sentences.chinese: 他是娇生惯养的男孩，一个人做不来这个。

sentences.english: He is a mama's boy and he can't live without his mother.
sentences.chinese: 他太娇生惯养了，离开母亲就无法自理生活了。

definition: pampered girl from an affluent family
to spoil/to indulge sb (usu. a child)
to have no need to fend for oneself (idiom)/to lead a pampered life
pinyin: shi2 zhi3 bu4 zhan1 yang2 chun1 shui3

definition: brocade garments, jade meals (idiom); a life of luxury/extravagance
to be accustomed to (a certain lifestyle etc)
